test_cases.law_yaml:
$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_basic
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: number
        actions:
          - output: result
            value: 42

$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_basic
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: string
        actions:
          - output: result
            value: "test_value"

test_cases.description: Direct assignment of literal boolean true
test_cases.law_yaml:
$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_basic
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: boolean
        actions:
          - output: result
            value: true

test_cases.description: Direct assignment of literal boolean false
test_cases.law_yaml:
$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_basic
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: boolean
        actions:
          - output: result
            value: false

$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_basic
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      definitions:
        TEST_VALUE: 100
      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: number
        actions:
          - output: result
            value: $TEST_VALUE

$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_basic
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        parameters:
          - name: input_val
            type: number
            required: true
        output:
          - name: result
            type: number
        actions:
          - output: result
            value: $input_val
